Class Boids

java.lang.Object
Boids
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoidsEvil, BoidsKind
public abstract class Boids extends Object
Abstract class which represents the skeleton for boids.

  • Constructor Details

    • Boids

      public Boids(float x, float y, float detectionRadius, float xMax, float yMax, String type)
      Constructor of boids.
      Parameters:
      x - Initial position of boids on the x-axis.
      y - Initial position of boids on the y-axis.
      detectionRadius - Radius where the boids repel each other.
      xMax - Maximum position of boids on the x-axis.
      yMax - Maximum position of boids on the y-axis.

    • canApproach

      public boolean canApproach(Boids b)
      Determine if boids can approach another depending on its family.
      Parameters:
      b - The target boids.
      Returns:
      True if the boids can approach boids b, else False.

      Returns:
